00019 int Net::bind_s(int socket, const struct sockaddr *address, socklen_t address_len) {
00020         int result;
00021         result = bind(socket, address, address_len);
00022         if (result == -1) {
00023                 throw runtime_error("Can't bind to address!");
00024         }
00025         return result;
00026 }
00027 
00028 int Net::socket_s(int __domain, int __type, int __protocol) {
00029         int sockfd = socket(__domain, __type, __protocol);
00030         if (sockfd == -1) {
00031                 throw runtime_error("Can't create UDP socket!");
00032         }
00033         return sockfd;
00034 }
